lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods revealed plans yesterday to design his first course in the United States. Woods, 31, said that his company, Tiger Woods Design, was planning a private course at about 4,000 feet in the Blue Ridge Mountains near Asheville, N.C. He had no timetable for its completion.
